title.rendered: Now Hiring + V.D. Giveaway + New Books!

content.rendered:
Now Hiring!

We are looking for a part-time store associate. If interested, please submit your resume to office@gottwalsbooks.com.

 

One FREE book to veterans!

Veterans… get a FREE used book of your choice, valued at $5.00 or less, on November 11th at our four Gottwals Books locations.  This is just a small way for us to say “thank you” for the sacrifices you’ve given for our security and freedom.

 

 

Special Hours on November 14th

On Monday, November 14th, we will be open from 12:00 p.m. – 6:00 p.m. in Byron, Macon, and Warner Robins.  We will be closed during the morning hours for staff training.  Regular hours will resume November 15th.

 

 

New Inventory!

Check out these new books at our Warner Robins store.

Indestructibles. These “baby-proof” books are washable AND resistant to tearing. Intensely colorful and visual with the words printed on the back of the book, these are meant to generate creative storytelling and dialogue between parent and baby to help develop early literacy, phonological recognition, and vocabulary skills. Indestructibles are $4.97 each.

 

Big Fat Notebook series. These notebooks feature the major concepts needed to ace middle school math, history, English, and science. The books highlight keyideas, doodle out complicated concepts, offer mnemonic devices for study, and feature quizzes for practice. Big Fat Notebooks, normally $14.95 each at suggested retail price, are only $9.97 each at Gottwals!

 
Star Wars workbooks. “Learn well, you will.” These Star Wars workbooks cover subjects such as math, reading, and writing for children in pre-school to second grade. Engage in an intergalactic story while learning! These workbooks are $7.97 each.
